amendment.description: Amendment modifies the Affordable Housing Trust Fund homeownership counseling criteria to include flood or other disaster specific insurance in applicable regions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-369 to amend the Affordable Housing Trust Fund homeownership counseling criteria to include flood or other disaster specific insurance in applicable regions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Hastings (FL).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
